items.title: Microsoft Corporation (MSFT): “Will You Cut It Out?” Asks Jim Cramer
items.description: We recently published 9 Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed As He Commented On Big Tech. Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT)’s shares have gained 22% year-to-date as the firm has managed to shift its AI narrative. While the shares had struggled in 2024, the firm has managed […]

items.title: Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL): “I Got It Wrong,” Admits Jim Cramer
items.description: We recently published 9 Stocks Jim Cramer Discussed As He Commented On Big Tech. Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOGL) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOGL)’s shares, like Microsoft’s stock, have staged a recovery in 2025. They have gained 1.5% year-to-date after having dipped by 16% from the start of the year […]
